reviewText: Best series ever.  I wish I could buy them all in a set
I bought this for my grandson and he watches it over and over.  I think I will be looking for more of these dvds.
My son has played these till the discs are just tired heheh. Great price and was a perfect buy for his birthday
ordered this for my girlfrends aunt to give to her niece, she enjoys the dvd and watches it on pbs every morning  gets old after a few watches but keeps her entertained
These videos are great for kids. Very educational.  My 2 1/2 year old knows his ABC's thanks to help from Alpha Pig!! He sings them to us all day long. I recommend Super Why to all parents.
